name: Operation Rescue Sparky
description:
Sparky, the Jamily's pet dog, has been kidnapped from his home by awful Dognappers who want to sell him on the blackmarket. Poor Sparky is too old and he is of no use to the Dognappers. As a result the evil Dognappers have decided to feed Sparky to their pet shark Brucie.

How to play?  All described on our website:

https://students.btsi.lu/herch/GameJamSites/PathOfTheDeveloper/

Or just try to find out, switch between item by pressing on them!
